name: JWL Linker EN-RU-ES

Features: auto-formatting (od 15 par. 3 â†’ od chap. 15 par. 3), multi-language WOL search, content extraction, and support for Watchtower, Awake!, books (od, it-1, cl, si, etc.), with automatic language detection and dual-mode citations.
